item.title: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Mykolayivka, Vasukivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region. Russian ... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Bakhmut direction Russian army shelled Mykolayivka, Vasukivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, New York of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: Ukrainian military had 67 combat engagements with Russian forces near Synkivka of Kharkiv region, Terny of Donetsk region and... (LiveUAMap)
